name: Creativity (itsNemo)
description:
Creativity is a minimal application that feeds your mind with creativity quotes.

The application contains over 300 quotes for now (I'll probably add more later but this should last a year). 

Quotes are chosen randomly, some quotes hit hard, some are light, some are funny. One thing that they all have in common is that they all talk about creativity. 

I needed something that I could open up and get inspired by other creators.  If you are a creator and sometimes need a motivational boost, try it out. Open the application daily, feed your mind and go CREATE!
